alert.note: Alert for Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 04 at 5:20PM EDT until June 04 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Gulf County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 545 PM EDT/445 PM CDT/. * At 520 PM EDT/420 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles east of Port St. Joe, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Port St. Joe, Milltown, Simmons Bayou, Jones Homestead and Ward Ridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
